name: Super Plumber Bros
description:
This game was created during the 2020 Global Game Jam.

In Super Plumber Bros you are tasked with repairing objects in your client's boiler room. With your trusty tools repair gas and water leaks before the time runs out, each repair grants you more time. The more leaks repair the higher your score.

A game by:
Christian Staley - Gameplay programmer and UI programmer
Manuel Bonnet - UI artist, 2d/3d artist and level designer

Asset credits:

 - Alex McCulloch - Elevator Music https://opengameart.org/content/elevator-music

- Water sounds - Recorded by Lisa Redfern

- Menu music - https://opengameart.org/content/menu-music-loop
